name: Miriam's Madness
description:
For my course's final project I decided to try and make a tiny Hack n Slash game. It's vertical slice and I don't know if I'm going to continue it at a later date. 

Things like animations and a few textures weren't finished due to deadlines.

Any feedback is appreciated! :D

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Shift - Dash
  • Right Click - Attack
  • E - Interact
